thread.title: Excellent value for a suite with 2 full baths
thread.title_full: Excellent value for a suite with 2 full baths - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 389josephw
title: Excellent value for a suite with 2 full baths
text:
Very good value for a suite with 2 full bathrooms.
Save even more and get a suite with no view.
Great location. Very well trained and experienced staff.
Housekeeping and room service always with a smile.
Front desk and concierge provide exceptional service.
I stay there 3 or 4 times per year.
